title: i am facing a lag
body: while playing recently i am facing huge lag from north america server .it was not the same always.the problem is such that i cant play the game at all with lag going upto 10000ms .i really dont know who is at fault please help me.

replies.body: Thanks for the logs!  Based on that it looks like you're getting some pretty big connection issues before ever leaving your network.  You'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your connection to the game servers and remove any obstacles along the way.  Test it out in a custom, though, to prevent any penalties.
